name: excrescence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical, biology
  specialized (also excrescency) an unusual growth on an animal or one of its organs, or on a plant: Adult males sometimes have a strange excrescence on the tip of their snouts. No nodular excrescences were seen in any of the outer segments. The excrescences were studied and were not associated with cerebrovascular disease. He had an excrescency in the shape of a rose on his left foot.
formal or literary something considered to be very ugly: excrescence on The new office development is an excrescence on the face of the city.
